content: Hi, I'm new here. Hope you can read my messages.

Hi @Naji Naser We can indeed - welcome. (Quick hint - when you post something, please change the topic name to something relevant to your query/statement. You'd posted this under "Ending the fax (and HL7v2)". I moved the discussion to a new thread.)

Thaaanks @Lloyd McKenzie for the hint.
Can I ask something:
I'm interested in the implementation of FHIR format in new applications. Is there a special channel for that?
Thaanks
Hey, I'm new here and am diving into the CQL/FHIR landscape, I have a few questions about CQL syntax/usage in advanced cases, where should I head to ? Cheers !
There are many streams available. For general implementation of FHIR, there is the #implementers stream, and for CQL, there the #cql stream
